mapper.select:
select * from attachment where deleted_flag=0
and folder_id=#{folderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and folder_name like concat(#{folderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and description like concat(#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
